description: A nicely textured and lightly seasoned dish that can be a side to share or a light main course.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free
name: Roasted Cauliflower Rice with Halloumi & Spinach Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g cauliflower, stak removed and shredded to rice size

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a nonstick pan to a medium heat with the sesame oil and cumin seeds. Fry the cauliflower rice for 5 minutes in the oil while tossing.
All the halloumi and fry for a further 2 minutes while tossing. Add the spinach and seasoning and fry for 1 more minute before serving.
